page.description: Settings for configuring how menu items are shown. Menu items are entries in the ExpandingMenu control that do not have child entries.

description.p: Specify one or more classes that will be applied to all menu items.
Specify the class name for menu items that are expanded.
Icon shown when the menu is expanded.
Specify the class name for menu items that are collapsed.
Icon shown when menu is collapsed.

The in-line style for the selected menu item. This option can be used to style the currently selected menu item differently from the rest of the Expanding Menu control, allowing you to highlight the active menu item.
